title-group.article-title: The Face of the Devil Finally Revealed

author-notes.corresp: Badr AbdullGaffar, Pathology Section, Rashid Hospital, Oud Metha Road, Dubai, United Arab Emirates Email: badraah009@yahoo.com

body.p: Even though the devil is believed by many religions and cultures to exist, nobody really knows what he looks like. There are many old and new paintings depicting the figure of the Satan. This, however, is subject to imagination!

An atrial myxoma has its say. The devil in details was hidden in this case of left atrial myxoma (Figure 1). This was revealed by “scientific” microscopic examination of the tumor. Interestingly, this case was associated with tumor emboli and deceivingly presented as an acute ischemic disease without accompanying cardiac symptoms or signs and thus was missed clinically. This reflects the evil deeds of this “little” Satan (Figure 2).

caption.p: A piece of the left atrial myxoma shows the details of an “evil” face with facial features as depicted in the mythology of the Satan
